user_query: I want to surprise my family with a vacation. Find me the latest trending images and relevant images for 'beach resorts' in the Bing Image Search API. Additionally, provide me with the supported languages and countries in the Bing Web Search API.

TaskList.description: Call the Bing Image Search API to retrieve the latest trending images for 'beach resorts'.
Call the Bing Image Search API to retrieve relevant images for 'beach resorts'.
Call the Bing Web Search API to gather information on supported languages and countries.
